dmca.title: Google DMCA - Patti Norton
dmca.body:
September 18, 2006


Patti Norton
234 North 5th Street
Port Hueneme, CA 93041 805 488-7445
contact@lacetoleather.com
Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043


Dear Sirs:
While using Google, I found eight sites and four pages on eBay containing content stolen from my website, lacetoleather.com. Enclosed are fourteen different letters, one for each of these sites and/or an eBay page. Please remove the specified sites or eBay pages from your search engine and directory.

Respectfully submitted,


Patti Norton

September 18, 2006

Patti Norton
234 North 5th Street
Port Hueneme, CA 93041 805 488-7445
contact@lacetoleather. corn

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sirs:

The owners of the site auctionu.com are misusing 11 pages of my website. My site is http://www.lacetoleather.com. They are using my titles on their site to make it look like their content. They are also using frames to make visitors think that my pages are part of their site - they have their name and menu at the top of each page. This could also make you think that their site has more content than it does, that all of my information is actually on their site, and that I have a duplicate site. Either way, I do not like it and they did not ask my permission to use my pages this way. Please remove this site from your search engine and directory.

My pages are officially registered with the Copyright office, and I need to give permission for them to be used in such a way, but I was not asked.

Below is a list of each of my pages followed by each of their pages. You can also see the directory for my Ebay pages at Ebay Auction Secrets For Buying or Selling, http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html.

I found this theft by searching for "When is the Best Time to List Your Items" and the results are on
http://www.google.com/search?q=%22When+is+the+Best+Time+to+List+Your+ltems% 22&hl=en&lr=&rls=GGLG,GGLG:2005-46,GGLG:en&start=20&sa=N&filter=0.

"Online Auction: online auction management software tools can save ...When is the Best Time to List Your Items?: When is the best time to list your items on eBay? And times to avoid to get the most sales and highest prices on ... auctionu.com/how_to_sell_on_ebay_information.html - 47k"

Pages linked from http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_buy_onebay_bidder_information.html:

How To Snipe on www.Ebay.com - http://www.lacetoleather.com/howtosnipe.html
How To Snipe - http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_buy/auction_how_to_snipe.html

When is the Best Time to Go Shopping on eBay? - httpl/wvvw.lacetoleather.com/whenisbestiml.html
When is the Best Time to Go Shopping? -
http://www. auctionu.com/how_to_buy/auction_when_is_the_best_time_to_go_shopping.html

How To Bid To Be Sure That You Win The Auction on eBay - http://wwvv.1acetoleather.com/winebay.html
How to Bid to Be Sure That You Win the Auction -
http://www.auctionu.com/how to_buy/auction_how_to_bid_to_be_sure_thatyou_win_the_auction.html

The Best Ways To Not Overpay For Items - http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaysecrets.html
The Best Ways To Not Overpay For Items - http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_buy/auction_the_best ways_to_not_overpay_for_items.html


Pages linked from http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_sell_on_ebay_information.html:

Ebay Auction Secrets For Buying Or Selling, To Save More Money Or Make More Money - http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html
Ebay Auction Secrets -
http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_sell/auction_ebay_auction_secrets.html

How To Get The Highest Prices For Your Items on Ebay - http://vvww.lacetoleather.com/earnmore.html
How To Get The Highest Prices For Your Items - http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_sell/auction_how_to_get_the_highest_prices for_your_items.html

How To Insure Your Bid Against Snipers on www.Ebay.com -
http://www.lacetoleather.com/howtonotgets.html
How to Insure Your Bid Against Snipers -
http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_sell/auction_how_to_insure_your_bid_against_snipers.html

When is the Best Time to List Your Items on eBay? - http://www.lacetoleather.com/whenisbestim.html
When is the Best Time to List Your Items? - http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_sell/auction_when_is_the_best_time_to_list_your_items.html
Wholesale Secrets - http://www.lacetoleather.com/dontpayforthis.html
Wholesale Secrets -
http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_sell/auction_wholesale_secrets. html

How To Drive Customers Away on www.Ebay.com - http://www.lacetoleather.com/dontdrivecustomersaway.html
How to Drive Customers Away -
http://vvww.auctionu.com/how_to_sell/auction_how to_drive_customers_away.html

A Little Etiquette, Please - http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebayetiquette.html A Little Etiquette, Please -
http://www.auctionu.com/how_to_sell/auction_a_little_etiquette_please.html

According to WhoIs, auctionu.com is owned by Virtual Clicks, Corporate Account (domain_whois@virtualclicks.com), P.O. Box 232471, San Diego, CA 92023, US, (720) 596-8887, Fax (999) 999-9999, and their server is quickserve.com.

According to WhoIs, quickserve.com is registered by Pair Networks, Inc., 2403 Sidney Street, Suite 510, Pittsburgh, PA 15203, US, (412) 381-7247, (412) 381-9997, domain@pair.com.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Respectfully submitted,

Patti Norton

September 12, 2006

Patti Norton
234 North 5th Street
Port Hueneme, CA 93041 805 488-7445
contact@lacetoleather. corn

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sirs:
The owner of the site bidteller.com copied nine pages of my website section on Ebay word for word. They even copied my titles on most and organization on all. What they did leave out is my Commission Junction affiliate links with Ebay, Global Equipment, Stamps.com, Dotster, and several web hosts, and several Click Bank affiliate links. This thief's server has the same contact information and owner as salesbetall.com - who also stole my Ebay content and about whom I sent you another letter on September 15, 2006. Please remove their site from your search engine and directory.
My pages are officially registered with the Copyright office. My pages are on the Wayback machine back to February, 2001; this section of my website was listed as site of the week with PBS on July 25, 2002 (which is also till listed on http://www.pbs.org/cringely/links/links20020725.html); this section of my website is also in dmoz.org; and my site is listed on Alexa.com. The Wayback Machine has "0 pages found for" http://www.bidteller.com, they are not listed in dmoz.org, and they are not listed on Alexa.com.
I found this theft by searching for "Anyone caught turning Priority Mail boxes inside out", and the results are on
http://www.google.com/search?q=%22Anyone+caught+turning+priority+Mail+boxes+inside+out%22&hl=en&lr=&rls=GGLG,GGLG:2005-46,GGLG:en&filter=0

"A How-To Guide to Online AuctionsAnyone caught turning Priority Mail boxes inside out to use a cheaper mail service will be in big trouble. We haven't done this so we don't know if you get ...
www.bidteller.com/shipping.html - 7k"

Below is a list of each of my pages followed by each of their pages. You can also see the directory for my Ebay pages at Ebay Auction Secrets For Buying or Selling, http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html.

They did not copy my page on Our Current eBay Items - http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebayauctions.html (including pictures of past auctions and a link to my seller's ID list of auctions); Auction Books - http://www.lacetoleather.com/auctionbooks.html (which is a page full of books which are affiliate links with Amazon.com); nor PBS Chose Us Out Of 6,230,000 Sites About Ebay And Out Of 103,000 Sites About Ebay Secrets - LOOK! - http://www.lacetoleather.com/publicityshots.html, which is a screen shot of when "Ebay Secrets, Ebay secrets for buying or selling,
(http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html)" was listed on PBS on July 25, 2002, as a favorite link of the week.

When is the Best Time to Go Shopping on eBay? - http://www.lacetoleather.com/whenisbestiml.html
The Best Time to Go Shopping - http://www.bidteller.com/shopping.html

The Best Ways To Not Overpay For Items - http://wvvw.lacetoleather.com/ebaysecrets.html
Avoid Overpaying For Items - http://www.bidteller.com/items.html

How To Bid To Be Sure That You Win The Auction on eBay - http://www.lacetoleather.com/winebay.html
How To Bid To Be Sure That You Win The Auction - http://www.bidteller.com/howtobid.html

How To Snipe on www.Ebay.com - http://www.lacetoleather.com/howtosnipe.html
How To Snipe - http://www.bidteller.com/snipe.html

How To Insure Your Bid Against Snipers on www.Ebay.com - http://www.lacetoleather.com/howtonotgets.html
How To Insure Your Bid Against Snipers - http://www.bidteller.com/snipe.html

When is the Best Time to List Your Items on eBay? - http://www.lacetoleather.com/whenisbestim.html
The Best Time to List Your Items - http://www.bidteller.com/listitems.html

A Little Etiquette, Please - http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebayetiquette.html
A Little Etiquette, Please - http://www.bidteller.com/etiquette.html

How Do People Get Free Shipping Supplies? - http://www.lacetoleather.com/freshipsup.html
Get Free Shipping Supplies - http://www.bidteller.com/shipping.html

How To Get The Highest Prices For Your Items on Ebay - http://www.lacetoleather.com/earnmore.html
How To Get The Highest Prices For Your Items - http://www.bidteller.com/prices.html

According to WhoIs, bidteller.com is owned by GOLDENDESIGN LLC, Odincova 23-1-174, Minsk, BY 220018, Belarus (next to Russia), (375) 284-9342, Fax (375) 284-9342. The technical and administration contact is Aleh Bunas at aleh@bit.by. Bidteller.com is registered through GoDaddy.com, Inc., was created on March 09, 2006, and its server is BITBY.COM.

According to WhoIs, BITBY.COM is owned by GOLDENDESIGN LLC, 31126 Kirkwood, Claims Rep, TX 75135, US (75135 zip code is actually for Caddo Mills, TX, and there is no Claims Rep, TX). Administration and technical contact is Andry White, white@bit.by, (903) 527-5647. BITBY.COM is registered through GoDaddy.com, Inc., was created on March 21, 2004, and its server is EV1SERVERS.NET.

According to WhoIs, EV1 SERVERS.NET can be reached at 390 Benmar Drive, Suite 200, Houston, TX 77060, US, (713) 333-7873, Fax: (713) 942-9332, or domainmanager@evl.net. EV1 SERVERS.NET was registered by TUCOWS, INC.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Respectfully submitted,

Patti Norton


September 12, 2006

Patti Norton
234 North 5th Street
Port Hueneme, CA 93041 805 488-7445
contact@lacetoleather.com

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sirs:
The owner of the site bigmysell.com copied all of my pages of my website section on Ebay word for word, 11 pages worth. They even copied my titles, subtitles, and organization. What they did leave out is my Commission Junction affiliate links with Ebay, Global Equipment, Stamps.com, Dotster, and several web hosts, and several Click Bank affiliate links. Please remove their site from your search engine and directory.
This is an exact duplicate of another site about which I wrote you on September 15, 2006, under the name of salesbetall.com, including url names.

My pages are officially registered with the Copyright office. My pages are on the Wayback machine back to February, 2001; this section of my website was listed as site of the week with PBS on July 25, 2002 (which is also till listed on http://www.pbs.org/cringely/links/links20020725.html); this section of my website is also in dmoz.org; and my site is listed on Alexa.com. The Wayback Machine has "0 pages found for" bigmysell.com, they are not listed in dmoz.org, and they are not listed on Alexa.com.
Below is a list of each of my pages followed by each of their pages. You can also see the directory for my Ebay pages at Ebay Auction Secrets For Buying or Selling, http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html. They have even listed my pages that they stole on bigmysell.com in the same order and with the same titles.

They did not copy my page on Wholesale Secrets - http://www.lacetoleather.com/dontpayforthis.html; Our Current eBay Items - http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebayauctions.html (including pictures of past auctions and a link to my seller's ID list of auctions); Auction Books - http://www.lacetoleather.com/auctionbooks.html (which is a page full of books which are affiliate links with Amazon.com); nor PBS Chose Us Out Of 6,230,000 Sites About Ebay And Out Of 103,000 Sites About Ebay Secrets - LOOK! - http://www.lacetoleather.com/publicityshots.html, which is a screen shot of when "Ebay Secrets, Ebay secrets for buying or selling, (http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html)" was listed on PBS on July 25, 2002, as a favorite link of the week.

I found this theft by searching for "yelling "Me first, me first!" when you walk into a bank full of customers", and the results are on
http://www.google.com/search?q=%22yelling+%22Me+first,+me+first!%22+when+you+walk+into+a+bank+full+of+customers%22&hl=en&lr=&rls=GGLG,GGLG:2005-46,GGLG:en&filter=0.

"Many secrets for buying or selling on Ebay are right here on these ...... but sending email immediately upon the end of the auction is like yelling "Me first, me first!" when you walk into a bank full of customers. ...
www.bigmysell.com/etiqette.html - 16k"

My Ebay contents page - page http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html Begins with my title reworded and subtitle copied word for word - http://vvww.bigmysell.com/index.html

When is the Best Time to List Your Items on eBay? - http://vvww.lacetoleather.com/whenisbestim.html When is the Best Time to List Your Items on eBay? - http://www.bigmysell.com/index.html

When is the Best Time to Go Shopping on eBay? - http://wvvw.lacetoleather.com/whenisbestiml.html When is the Best Time to Go Shopping on eBay? - http://www.bigmysell.com/whenisbestime.html

The Best Ways To Not Overpay For Items - http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaysecrets.html
The Best Ways To Not Overpay For Items on eBay - http://www.bigmysell.com/thebestitem.html

How To Bid To Be Sure That You Win The Auction on eBay - http://www.lacetoleather.com/winebay.html
How To Bid To Be Sure That You Win The Auction on eBay - http://www.bigmysell.com/howtobid. html

How To Snipe on www.Ebay.com - http://www.lacetoleather.com/howtosnipe.html
How To Snipe on Ebay - http://www.bigmysell.com/howtosnipe.html

How To Insure Your Bid Against Snipers on www.Ebay.com - http://vvww.lacetoleather.com/howtonotgets.html
How To Insure Your Bid Against Snipers on Ebay - http://www.bigmysell.com/howtoinsure.html

A Little Etiquette, Please - http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebayetiquette.html
A Little Etiquette, Please - http://www.bigmysell.com/etigette.html
Note: They left out my link of "porcelain pieces" which goes to a picture of damaged goods I received in an Ebay auction.

How Do People Get Free Shipping Supplies? - http://www.lacetoleather.com/freshipsup.html How Do People Get Free Shipping Supplies? - http://www.bigmysell.com/getfreeshipping.html
Note: They left out my affiliate links with Commission Junction for shipping supplies.

How To Get The Highest Prices For Your Items on Ebay - http://www.lacetoleather.com/earnmore.html
How To Get The Highest Prices For Your Items on Ebay - http://www.bigmysell.com/gethighestprices.html

Pictures really SELL your items. - http://www.lacetoleather.com/sellbigonebay.html
Pictures really SELL your items. - http://www.bigmysell.com/howtosellitems.html
Note: on this page, they left out my affiliate links with Commission Junction for web hosts, one affiliate link with Fine Clicks for a web host, and one link with Commission Junction for Dotster to get their own domain name.

How To Drive Customers Away on www.Ebay.com - http://www.lacetoleather.com/dontdrivecustomersaway.html How To Drive Customers Away on Ebay - http://www.bigmysell.com/customersaway.html

According to WhoIs, the site was registered by Domains by Proxy, Inc., DomainsByProxy.com, 5111 N. Hayden Road., Suite 160, PMB 353, Scottsdale, Arizona 85260, US, (480) 624-2599, private registration
BIGMYSELL.COM@domainsbyproxy.com, is registered through GoDaddy.com, Inc., http://www.godaddy.com, was created on January 30, 2006, and the server is BITEURO.COM.

According to Whols, BITEURO.COM is under Domans by Proxy and GoDaddy.com again, and the server is EV1SERVERS.NET.

According to Whols, EV1SERVERS.NET can be reached at 390 Benmar Drive, Suite 200, Houston, TX 77060, US, (713) 333-7873, Fax: (713) 942-9332, or domainmanager@evl.net. EV1 SERVERS.NET was registered by TUCOWS, INC.

This is the same server as for bidteller.com, about whom I wrote you another letter on September 12, 2006.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Respectfully submitted,

Patti Norton

Dear Sirs:

The owner of the site dropshipdesign.com copied three full pages of my website section about Ebay word for word. They even copied my titles, subtitles, and organization. Please remove their site from your search engine and directory.

My pages are officially registered with the Copyright office. My pages are on the Wayback machine back to February, 2001; this section of my website was listed as site of the week with PBS on July 25, 2002 (which is also till listed on http://www.pbs.org/cringely/links/Iinks20020725.html); this section of my website is also in dmoz.org; and my site is listed on Alexa.com. This site was created on February 27, 2004.
I found this site by searching for "Anyone caught turning Priority Mail boxes inside out", and the results are on
http://search.yahoo.com/search?p=%22Post+Office+is+still+%22pushing%22+their+Priority+Mail+services%22&prssweb=Search&ei=UTF-8&xargs=0&pstart=l &dugs=l .

Below is a list of each of my pages followed by each of their pages. You can also see the directory for my Ebay pages at Ebay Auction Secrets For Buying or Selling, http://www.lacetoleather.com/ebaucsecforb.html

When is the Best Time to List Your Items on eBay? - http://www.lacetoleather.com/whenisbestim.html

How To Get The Highest Prices For Your Items on Ebay - http://www.lacetoleather.com/earnmore.html
TIP #5 - How To Get The Highest PRICE For Your Item - http://www.dropshipdesign.com/tips.htm

According to WhoIs, dropshipdesign.com is registered by Domains by Proxy, Inc., DomainsByProxy.com, 15111 N. Hayden Road., Suite 160, PMB 353, Scottsdale, Arizona 85260, US, (480) 624-2599, Fax (480) 624-2599, and is registered through GoDaddy.com, Inc., http://www.godaddy.com, and the server is DSDSERVERS.COM.

According to WhoIs, DSDSERVERS.COM is registered by Sales Team, 321 High School Road NE, PMB 348, Suite D3, Bainbridge Island, Washington 98110, US, and is registered through Weship2U.com, which was created on September 18, 2005.

Contact information on the website is DropshipDesign.com, LLC, 16212 Bothell Everett Hwy., Suite #F279, Mill Creek WA, 98012-1219, US, sales@dropshipdesign.com.

Dear Sirs:

Ebay user house-of-designs copied my original content word for word from my website, http://www.iacetoleather.com, on their eBay guide page. I have written eBay so that they can remove the content from their site, but I want to also be sure that this page is also removed from your search engine pages.

I found this guide in a search for "When is the Best Time to List Your Items" and the results are on
http://www. google. com/search?q=%22When+is+the+Best+Time+to+List+Your+Items%22&hl=en&Ir=&rls=GGLG,GGLG:2005-46,GGLG:en&start=0&sa=N&filter=0.

"eBay Australia Guides - When is the best time to list your itemsYou may think that you should list your items on Saturday mornings because that is when you have the most free time or on Monday nights after 10 00pm ...
reviews.ebay.com.au/When-is-the-best-time-to-list-youritems_W0QQugidZ10000000000928525?ssPageName=BUYGD:... - 31 k"

The url of the guide is http://reviews.ebay.com.au/When-is-the-best-time-to-list-your-items_W0QQugidZ10000000000928525?ssPageName=BUYGD:CAT:-1: SEARCH:1. The guide is called "When is the best time to list your items?" but is a copy of my page at http://www.lacetoleather.cam/whenisbestim.html, also called "When is the Best Time to List Your Items?".

My pages are officially registered with the Copyright office. My pages are on the Wayback machine back to February, 2001; this section of my website was listed as site of the week with PBS on July 25, 2002 (which is also till listed on http://www.pbs.org/cringely/links/links20020725.html). My website is also listed on dmoz.org and Alexa.com. The guide listed above was created in 2006.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Patti Norton
